long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension adds a new DevTools panel specifically designed to debug and analyze Open Graph (OG) tags on the currently active tab. Open Graph tags are crucial for controlling how web pages are displayed when shared on social media platforms.

Key Features:
1. Dedicated DevTools Panel: Seamlessly integrates into your browser's developer tools, providing easy access to OG tag information.
2. Tag Visualization: Presents OG tags in a clear, hierarchical structure for easy comprehension. It automatically displays the og:image when one is present.
